content.query:
--use serverless: default db

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
BULK 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/resultparquet',
FORMAT = 'parquet') as resultparquet


/* fails due to unicode and 
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/result/part-00000',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    FIELDTERMINATOR ='',
    PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
) WITH ( C1 nVARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    C2 nVARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    C3 nVARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8   ) as results

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/resultcsv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
